item.title: Express Entry Proof of funds
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Introduction When applying for Canada’s Express Entry program, one of the requirements is to show that you have enough funds to support yourself and your family during your first few months in Canada. This is known as proof of funds (for express entry). What is express entry program Canada’s Express Entry program is a way […]

item.title: Debt consolidation loans
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Debt consolidation loans can be a good option for people who are struggling to manage multiple debts with different interest rates and monthly payments. By consolidating your debts into a single loan with a lower interest rate and a single monthly payment, you may be able to simplify your debt repayment and potentially save money […]

item.title: Sample invitation letter for super visa
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
The super visa is a type of visitor visa that allows parents and grandparents of Canadian citizens or permanent residents to visit Canada for up to two years at a time. In this post, I will share an overview and sample invitation letter for super visa. The super visa is a multiple-entry visa, which means […]

item.title: BMO NewStart program
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
The BMO NewStart program is a financial assistance program offered by the Bank of Montreal (BMO) to help individuals who are experiencing financial hardship due to unforeseen circumstances, such as job loss, illness, or natural disasters. The program provides a range of support services and financial assistance to help individuals get back on their feet, […]

The post BMO NewStart program appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Transfer money from Canada to India
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
There are several ways to send money from Canada to India, including bank-to-bank transfers, online money transfer services, and mobile money transfer apps. Here are some things to consider when choosing a method: Fees Compare the fees charged by different banks and money transfer services to find the option that offers the best value. Some […]

item.title: Confirmation of Permanent Residence (COPR)
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
A Confirmation of Permanent Residence (COPR) is a document that is issued by Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) to individuals who have been approved for permanent residence in Canada. It is typically issued along with a Permanent Resident (PR) Visa, which is a document that allows individuals to enter Canada as permanent residents. What […]

item.title: Best bank in Canada
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
It’s difficult to say which is the “best” bank in Canada, as different banks may be better suited to different people depending on their individual financial needs and preferences. Some things to consider when choosing a bank in Canada include: Fees Consider whether the bank charges fees for services like account maintenance, overdraft protection, or […]

item.title: [5 tips on ] staying warm during the colder months
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
In Ontario, winters can be cold and harsh, but there are several ways you can stay warm during the colder months. Here are a few tips: Dress in layers Wearing multiple layers of clothing traps heat next to your body and keeps you warm. Make sure to wear a base layer made of a material […]
